channel.title: Machine Learning on AJTRE
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on AJTRE

item.title: Image Inpainting with Variational Autoencoders
item.description: Restoring corrupted image with Variational Autoencoders, a machine learning technique This work presents the training methodology of variational autoencoder in order to restore the missing part of a corrupted image and question the requirement of homogeneity in the implementation and difference situation of corrupted data. * corresponding author (cg226@stud.uni-heidelberg.de) Received: 01 March 2020, Accepted: 09 June 2020, Published: 31 December 2020 DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.4383315 | üìÅ view PDF file
